name: the garden (itch) (starrrs, albym, Cemetery_Jones)
description:
welcome to the garden

      Waking up in a place peacefully isolated from the human world, 

    an almost biblical atmosphere constructed by a higher power thousands of years ago. 

     As the resting place of ancient architecture and technology, this game depicts a garden sealed away by its creators, to which the player must be the

                                                                                                                            bearer of restoration.

-

this was made in collaboration with other creators; so major credits to Alby and Zach, the game would not have any of the visuals it has otherwise!

all code by Bella

all 3D art, shaders, and textures by Alby and Zach

any other 3rd party assets sourced are located in the projects readme document.
